items.title: Honeywell Finalizes Sundyne Acquisition to Boost Its Process Industry Strength
items.description: Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is one of the best Dow stocks to invest in. On June 9, the company announced that it had finalized its $2.16 billion all-cash acquisition of Sundyne from private equity firm Warburg Pincus. Sundyne, known for its advanced pumps and gas compressors used in process industries, is expected to contribute immediately [â€¦]
